- Issue reports welcome!
- share difficulties encountered (in setup, missing/unclear docs...)

BEFORE SUBMITTING TO THE MAIN BRACH:

check if all features have appropriate tests
run testing
check TODOs, NOTEs
check indentation, trailing spaces
update README - check readme_update
check ROAD_PLAN for related notes
remove unnecessary files
add static asserts where necessary
check backups
check circular includes in std
